wro4j.grails.plugin
[Groovy] Class GrailsWroManagerFactory

java.lang.Object
  ro.isdc.wro.manager.factory.BaseWroManagerFactory
      wro4j.grails.plugin.GrailsWroManagerFactory

class GrailsWroManagerFactory
extends ro.isdc.wro.manager.factory.BaseWroManagerFactory

The Grails WroManagerFactory. It does 2 things : load the Wro Model DSL (Wro.groovy) and load the preProcessors, postProcessors and uriLocators from the Config files (Config.groovy override DefaultWroConfig.groovy)

Authors:
Filirom1
